storyInfo: Viviana returns to Ognisko and finds that much has changed. She reassesses her relationship with Ognisko and says a final goodbye to the city.

attributes.content: Wake up, Mr. Navigator!
attributes.name: Technician

attributes.content: Didn't I say the route is fine...?
attributes.name: Navigator

attributes.content: We just detected an unknown nomadic plate, when there shouldn't be any on our route.
attributes.name: Technician

attributes.content: We hailed them, and they're calling themselves Ognisko.
attributes.name: Technician

attributes.content: Ognisko... Isn't that a stationary city?
attributes.name: Navigator

attributes.content: Did you check their call sign? Is it legal?
attributes.name: Navigator

attributes.content: It is. The registered owner is...
attributes.name: Technician

attributes.content: Mr. McKee, of the Rose Paper Union.
attributes.name: Technician

attributes.content: Back for more of the same, Viviana? Soft bread and marjoram sausage?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Wow, you still remember? I haven't stopped by in quite a while.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Thanks. I'll be back next time I'm in Ognisko.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Sorry, but I'm about to close this shop down, maybe as early as next week. You'll have to go elsewhere next time.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: What? Why, if you don't mind telling me?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Found a new job, that's all. I'll still be a shopkeep, but I'll be selling weird trinkets instead. And I'll be getting paid for it instead of putting my own money in.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: I've got you to thank for it, actually. We've had more jobs opening up around here ever since those reporters came looking for you with their cameras.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Not that there's much I can do to thank you... how about we say this one's on me?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: You're too kind. You don't owe me anything. In fact, there's something I want to ask you.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Do you know of any other shop on this street with food as good as yours? My master likes it the way you make them.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: If you really want, you can come to my house and I'll make you some.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: But I think you've got other things to worry about when it comes to your master...
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Take good care of her, Viviana. She may have caused a bit of trouble, but nobody's really holding it against her.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: She's the one who built a lot of our furnaces, after all.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Trouble?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Nothing serious. Guess it's just hard to accept change at that age, stubborn as she is.
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Viviana?
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Citizen

attributes.content: Oh, nothing. I just thought I saw someone I knew.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Do a lot of people wear suits in Ognisko these days?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'm back, master. I put your food on the table.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I told you, just call me Obina.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: What about the iron? The food I can live without, but not the iron.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Yes, but you can only have it after you've eaten.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: If I let you light your furnace first, you'll forget to eat all day.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Hah! I'm tough, I can take it.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: 'Everyone breaks. The only thing that doesn't is iron.' You said that yourself.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I say a lot of things!
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I also said, 'The first smith on the great plains caught the fire that fell from the sky, lifted the metal that grew from the ground, and hammered it for nine days and nights without rest.'
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: By comparison, I'm downright lazy. And that won't do. The fire in the furnace goes out quick if you're lazy.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Now where are the tongs? Fetch 'em for me.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You can't fool me that easily.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But you do seem like you're in good spirits today. I haven't heard you talk so much in a long time. I was worrying about you on the way back.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...Am I talking a lot today?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Normally, you'd just say 'Give me the tongs.'
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Alright, I...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I just wanted to ask when you're leaving.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Tomorrow morning, at first light. You didn't have to be so roundabout about it.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You won't stay?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Just another half a month... or even a few days?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I can put this workshop under your name. We can keep hammering iron together. I made the ceiling higher, so you won't keep hitting your antlers on it.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I... didn't expect you to want me to stay.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'll be going, master.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's your life. Just don't forget anything.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm saying goodbye now because the ride's really early tomorrow, and I don't want to wake you.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What am I, your mother? You don't my permission to leave. No need for goodbyes, either. Just go where you want—it's none of my business.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You don't need to tell me even if you become Grand Knight.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I know, you've never been concerned about those things.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Just like you've never cared who I am, or where I'm from.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Hah! You're you. Who else could you be?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Thank you. That means more to me than any words of praise.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: How would you know? I haven't praised you before.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: But you did do good work when you were hammering iron with me. You're got nimble hands and a calm heart. You've got potential.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: As for whatever you do elsewhere, I'm not gonna poke my nose into that. Just don't get yourself killed.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I won't, master.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'll be back to see you someday.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Candle Knight! Why have you chosen to leave Ognisko? Where are you going next?
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: What do you think about Moonlight Knight's performance this spring, after she replaced you in the Nova Knightclub?
attributes.name: Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Sorry, folks, but I have a ride to catch... It leaves in ten minutes.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You're avoiding the question, Madam Droste...
attributes.name: Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Candle Knight! One moment—
attributes.name: Impatient Reporter

attributes.content: What are you taking all those photos for?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You never seen a human before?!
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You like to talk, right? How about you tell me what makes Viviana different from anyone else?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: How is where she's going any of your business?! Get lost.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I... didn't expect you to want me to stay.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Tsk. Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I must still be half-asleep... I'm heading out now.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Where to? I already bought everything.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Don't worry about it, Viviana.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: And don't follow me.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Get the furnace lit. You can forge anything you want today. Then you can go wherever you want tomorrow.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Mr. McKee.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I just watched that blacksmith leave. Hard to imagine that I'd see an old woman with the same kind of aura I see in knights going to war.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: She reminds me of a certain other stubborn person... someone who had a great influence on you.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Obina is just an ordinary blacksmith. She has nothing to do with anyone you know, and there's nothing worth digging into there.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Madam Droste... the last time I saw you take such a firm stance was when you refused to use extraordinary methods to defeat the Radiant Knight at the Major.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: I had thought the Radiant Knight would look after you after you were 'reassigned' to Ognisko, but she has her own path to walk, and it's been hard for her to come see you.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: So I was relieved to learn that you met someone in Ognisko who could take care of you... even if she's just an ordinary blacksmith.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Obina has nothing in common with the Radiant Knight, and the care she shows for me has nothing to do with her either.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She did, however, help me experience a sort of... peace, which I had never felt before.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I can only imagine how precious that peace is to you.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: That's why I wanted to let you know that, whether it be that blacksmith or Ognisko itself, there is, in fact, something worth digging into here. Even if you'd rather not think so.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: ...How much do you know about the recent changes in Ognisko?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I know that the nomadic platforms parked outside the city belong to Glorious Shield Industries, and that they're being used to rebuild the city.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Those colorful ribbons on the houses, those plastic flowers on the branches, even the model weapons and knight emblems on the streets... they all came from Glorious Shield?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And those people pretending to hammer iron behind glass windows... they're on Glorious Shield's payroll, aren't they?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And Glorious Shield's partners.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: A large Knightclub like Nova produces their stars in specific ways. Theme songs, slogans, ways of speaking, ways of fighting, outfits, backstories, ideologies...
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: A competition knight's career in the arena only lasts so long. No knight, no matter how professional, can ever fully fill the spiritual needs of the fans.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: However, the gaps can be filled with exhibitions, concerts, talk shows, and books.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: So, weapons manufacturers like Glorious Shield are trying to give their products 'story' and 'character', to fill these spiritual gaps of the fans, so to speak?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: And they've selected Ognisko as the backdrop for it?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The ancient city of forests and craftsmen, with a proud heritage of forging dating back to the wild ages. Is there a better choice?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: It will become a huge film studio, where all the inhabitants are actors performing legends of forging.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Smiths will be able to make a decent living without the sweat and toil of bending down in front of a furnace, and Glorious Shield will have access to 'divine weapons' that look just like the stuff of legend.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: ...At least, that's what was supposed to happen.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Then... I take it Obina was asked to join in on that 'performance'?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I don't know the details. But an old blacksmith who gave her whole life to crafting, and someone who's so closely connected to you of all people... Is there a better choice?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: They may take... less accommodating measures with her.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: If she's as stubborn as I imagine, then she may have already gotten a strong response from them, given what I know of Glorious Shield.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: If so, I'd be just as angry as you. It would mean Glorious Shield is still lacking in consideration.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: I have to find her!
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Wait, Madam Droste...
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Stop this foolishness, Obina.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: You want to play along with them, let them shut you in a show window?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You know as well as I do that your actions are meaningless, ma'am. The glass that you broke today will be fixed by tomorrow.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: The damages you'll be liable for are more than you can afford. All you're hurting is your own livelihood.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Unless, of course, you sign this agreement, in which case the damages will be deducted from your wages.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: You say I'm hurting my own livelihood?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I didn't bring a stack of kurwa 'agreements' to ask for the privilege to close my own workshop and pretend hammer iron with a rubber hammer in a show window!
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: You know some of the apprentices don't really like hammering iron.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: And not all of us old folks are as strong and healthy as you. In a couple of years, I'm not sure I'll be able to lift a real hammer myself.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: But we need a way forward.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: The smiths of Ognisko have lifted their hammers since before there were even any castles on the great plains.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Did you forget the meaning of the name 'Ognisko'?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: 'Furnace'. I've never forgotten.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: Then you know that to forge was our way forward, is our way forward, and will always be our way forward.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Er, I apologize for interrupting, but the town council is also planning to rename the city.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Once Glorious Shield's branding experts arrive, the city will have a new name, one more suited for a new era.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Whaagh!
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Ahem... you have that on camera? Please cut my reaction. But keep the segment of Madam Obina swinging her hammer at me.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Allowing you to deduct the damages from your wages after signing the agreement is a special exception we're willing to make just for you, ma'am.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Normally, we would simply call the police and deal with this properly.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Compared to prison, however, I'm sure you would—
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: I'm sure you would prefer to end this conflict and give yourself time to admire the sights of Ognisko—before it's destroyed by your company's engineering casters.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: After all, until your company's experts arrive, none of your hard work here will be seen by your superiors.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Finally, the Candle Knight! Casters, zoom in on her, and get a few more drones on it...
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: What do you mean, the screen's all black? Did you forget to take off the lens cover?
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Candle Knight... your Arts...
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: I've visited your headquarters before. Every reception room has thick curtains to block out the light.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You know as well as I do that some things are unsuited for being admired by everyone under the light.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I hope you understand that I'm simply defending my company's lawful interests.
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Your losses will be reasonably compensated.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Thank you for your understanding. Now perhaps you would be interested in hearing our plans...
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Maybe another day.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Let's go, Obina.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Viviana, I told you...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I told you not to follow me...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm sorry. You never asked about my situation, so it would be tactless of me to ask about yours.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: However, in this case, your business is also mine.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...Your legs are shaking. Come, take my arm.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What are you just standing there for? Haven't you got any backup cameras? Go catch up to them!
attributes.name: Glorious Shield Spokesman

attributes.content: Haven't you already gotten enough material for days worth of headlines?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I suggest you stop.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Unless you want to replace all your camera sensors.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Is this why you wanted me to stay, Obina?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You wanted me to protect the workshop.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: May sparks burn my mouth, Viviana. I shouldn't have said anything about wanting you to stay, or gone to wreck their place before you left.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm too old, and I've gone soft, like a hunk of iron that's spent too long in the flames.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: There isn't much difference between protecting the workshop and buying materials for you.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You could have told me directly. It's not a sign of weakness.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No, Viviana... I didn't plan on asking for your help at all.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I tried everything. But as you can see, it's no use, no matter how many of their windows I break.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: What difference can one person make? They have hundreds, thousands of people...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: But... but...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Someone told me that you're a noble, a knight. Your voice is worth a hundred, a thousand of us ordinary folk. Someone told me that if the workshop belonged to you, no one would dare mess with it.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm at the end of my wits here. Sorry, Viviana...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Help me, Candle Knight.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: The Candle Knight. How many have called her by that name?
Viviana has long since lost count. When she hears the title, she reflexively turns around and bows, just as a light turns on when the switch is flipped.
An instinctive numbness, a numb instinct.
Right now, however, Obina calling her by that title sends a shiver up her spine.
I don't know any other way to apologize, but I want you to know...
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'll think of a way. I promise.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But I don't understand.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I just don't understand...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Why are you the one who has to feel guilty? Be it between friends, or between master and student, it's not at all unusual to need each other's help.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's partly my fault that you're in such difficult straits. If I hadn't drawn so much attention to Ognisko...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I've never even repaid you for taking me in as your student, but I ended up causing you so much trouble. If anyone should feel guilty, it would be me.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's not the same, Viviana.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: But never mind. Thank you for being willing to help.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: At least the workshop will still be there for you the next time you come back... If you still have a reason to.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: ...Do you want me to light the furnace for you?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: No, I won't be smithing today.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Ognisko seems to have become awfully quiet.
In the past, the sound of metal banging on metal would be echoing through the city at this hour, and Obina would be humming a random tune to match the rhythm of it. It was a reassuring kind of noise.
Now, however, the only thing she hears is the rustling of leaves.
Is it because all the smiths have agreed to close their shops? But why are even the fowlbeasts silent?
Suddenly, Viviana hears a familiar voice in the distance—
'Glorious Shield Industries military products, guaranteed to help you conquer the wilderness and repel any Catastrophes!'
'Dear Mr. Zamark. Concerning the rebuilding of Ognisko...'
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You agreed to help the blacksmith.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Who will help YOU, then?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: ...What are you getting at?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You weren't this melancholic when you refused to use extraordinary methods to defeat the Radiant Knight.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: The Viviana Droste I know has a light in her eyes when she decides to embark on a little rebellion.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: You've always been so sensitive to subtle emotions.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Perhaps you could have been a poet, if the Rose Paper Union still published poems.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Nonsense. I should be thanking you for helping me understand the value of poetry.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: And I should thank you for your concern.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I'm fine. It's just that I don't quite understand everything yet. First, I need to finish this letter.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: There was no need for you to deal with them on your own... We could have saved this workshop, even all of Ognisko, together.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Glorious Shield is being short-sighted. It won't take long for people to start asking why all of these so-called legendary weapons are coming from the same city.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: The fate of a city that fades back into obscurity is even darker than one that never had its day in the sun.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: You appreciate Ognisko's beauty more than Glorious Shield's surveyors, and beauty is eternal... so long as you can bring it out.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: You said you couldn't write poems in Kawalerielki, but Ognisko is the birthplace of freedom, the land of poets. Is it not?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Write a poem about Ognisko, and we can develop this place in a different manner.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Everyone will have better lives, without having to change their way of living.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: And why are you doing this? You've only been here for a few days.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But you've lived in this city, and found a peace that you've never known before. Isn't that what you said?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: I would think that would be reason enough.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Just because I find comfort here?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Of course, Madam Droste.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Most knights assigned to 'recuperate' in remote towns can't wait to leave them.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: You, however, have repeatedly visited Ognisko. Is there another reason, other than this being a place of comfort for you?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: A place of comfort...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: The birthplace of freedom.
But we need a way forward.
attributes.name: Worried Smith

attributes.content: The land of poets.
Then you know that to forge was our way forward, is our way forward, and will always be our way forward.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Viviana's place of comfort.
I'm at the end of my wits here. Help me, Candle Knight.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: My place of comfort is a place of comfort for Viviana alone.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Just because I like the shade of the trees, and the songs of the fowlbeasts, the furnaces and the sparks, just because...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Just because I like how the people here don't care where I came from, who I am, and where I'm going.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: You know this, and so does Obina.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: That's why you proposed to protect Ognisko 'for me', and why she felt so guilty about asking for my help.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She feared that even saying the words 'Candle Knight' would destroy my place of comfort.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She didn't want to ruin my hopes for her because of her powerlessness.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Even if I'm the very cause of her dilemma.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Even if you never came to Ognisko, all of this would still have occurred eventually.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: McKee...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Thank you for the kind offer.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: But I can't accept it.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: I, and only I, am responsible for Obina's changes.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: She thought that seeking my help would ruin everything she meant to me. She was ashamed of it, and suffered so much from it...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...As if she weren't my master or my friend, but just a tool to give me comfort.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: If so, is there really any difference between my poetry and Glorious Shield's film studio?
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: If that's what my poems are...
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Then I will write no poems for Ognisko.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Henceforth, Viviana's poems shall only be of herself.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: As always, your resolve is... surprising.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: And there I was, thinking I'd finally come to know you after all these years.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: You already know me quite well, McKee.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: It's Obina whom you don't know, although even I've only started to know just her moments ago. Far too late.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...Hm. I guess even your thinking can change.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: It's like chasing after the horizon. Every time I take a step forward, it takes a step back.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: My thinking so far has mostly been naive, and not nearly worth the effort of understanding. I simply fear that what happened to Obina will happen to you too.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Maybe I just wanted some kind of salvation. I can't help but feel that I'm constantly sinking, even as the Rose Paper Union's stock prices continue to rise.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Well, if you're still seeking 'salvation' from me... then allow me to borrow your name.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: My name?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Most of my assets in Kazimierz are frozen under the Nova Knightclub name, but there may still be enough to purchase a small nomadic platform.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: So if you're willing to help, it may be more appropriate to make the purchase under your name.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: What do you need a nomadic platform for?
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: To take Ognisko away, or at least the people who still see her as a furnace.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: ...Very well.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Let's go. The furnace that was born on the plains shall return to the plains.
attributes.name: Viviana

attributes.content: Is everyone here?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Everyone who still wants to hammer iron rather than play along with that farce.
attributes.name: Excited Blacksmith

attributes.content: Good! There's hope for Ognisko yet. The flames yet burn in the furnace of the great plains.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: We're about to sail, Master McKee! There's no issue, is there?
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: From the deck of the nomadic platform, McKee casts his gaze towards the wilderness in the distance.
A faint flame flickers in the darkness. In its light, Viviana's green cape looks like a ghost, drifting in the wind.
At least, that is how he would describe it, if he were writing a poem.
She's gone.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: She'll be back.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Her outfit...
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: I had someone make it for her when she was living in Ognisko. A knight's garb isn't exactly for everyday use.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I thought she would disassociate herself completely from Ognisko.
attributes.name: McKee

attributes.content: Before she left, she asked me whether I truly felt happy when we were hammering iron together by the forge.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: I was happy. Of course I was.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: She said she was too. And she said that was enough.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: Then, she asked me to take out that outfit and help her put it on.
attributes.name: Obina

attributes.content: 'Henceforth, Viviana's poems shall only be of herself'...
attributes.name: McKee
